title: Happy New Year & Happy Birthday
detail_text: <:th_ch0104/>Happy new year, Kanan-san. I’ll be in your care again this year<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Happy new year, Dia. I’ll also be in yours!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>I think Ruby will get here soon, so please wait for a little bit. We are on time for the first shrine visit with everyone, right?<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>We have plenty of time. Ah, maybe I should say it before Ruby-chan gets here. Dia, happy birthday<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Thank you very much. With the start of the new year also comes the beginning of a new year for me, I’ll have to be even more diligent<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>....You know, I really admire that side of you, Dia. I’m really happy that you were born and that we can be friends like this. For you, for me.... and for everyone else, let’s make this year a wonderful one<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Kanan-san....<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Ahaha, it’s the beginning of the year, so I thought I should be serious, right! Ah, looks like Ruby-chan is here. We’ll have your birthday party after this shrine visit, today will be busy~!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0104/>Fufu, I’m looking forward to it. Don’t break down before I do, okay<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0103/>Oh, if it’s a battle of endurance, then I won’t lose! Let’s enjoy ourselves to the fullest!<:dt_line_end/><:th_ch0000/>Translated by SIFAStheatre and Idol Story<:dt_line_end/>
